greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse binomial transform of the number of overpartitions (A015128).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = [x^n] (1 - x)^n/theta_4(x), where theta_4() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 03 2017
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2017
